name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Identifiers assigned to this order by the order sender or by the order receiver.

name: $addidentifier
desc: Identifiers assigned to this order by the order sender or by the order receiver.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifiers assigned to this order by the order sender or by the order receiver.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The workflow status of the nutrition order/request.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The workflow status of the nutrition order/request.

name: $patient
desc: Returns: The person (patient) who needs the nutrition order for an oral diet, nutritional supplement and/or enteral or formula feeding.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The person (patient) who needs the nutrition order for an oral diet, nutritional supplement and/or enteral or formula feeding.

name: $encounter
desc: Returns: An encounter that provides additional information about the healthcare context in which this request is made.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An encounter that provides additional information about the healthcare context in which this request is made.

name: $dateTime
desc: Returns: The date and time that this nutrition order was requested.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date and time that this nutrition order was requested.

name: $orderer
desc: Returns: The practitioner that holds legal responsibility for ordering the diet, nutritional supplement, or formula feedings.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The practitioner that holds legal responsibility for ordering the diet, nutritional supplement, or formula feedings.

name: $allergyIntolerance
desc: Returns: A link to a record of allergies or intolerances  which should be included in the nutrition order.

name: $addallergyIntolerance
desc: A link to a record of allergies or intolerances  which should be included in the nutrition order.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A link to a record of allergies or intolerances  which should be included in the nutrition order.

name: $foodPreferenceModifier
desc: Returns: This modifier is used to convey order-specific modifiers about the type of food that should be given. These can be derived from patient allergies, intolerances, or preferences such as Halal, Vegan or Kosher. This modifier applies to the entire nutrition order inclusive of the oral diet, nutritional supplements and enteral formula feedings.

name: $addfoodPreferenceModifier
desc: This modifier is used to convey order-specific modifiers about the type of food that should be given. These can be derived from patient allergies, intolerances, or preferences such as Halal, Vegan or Kosher. This modifier applies to the entire nutrition order inclusive of the oral diet, nutritional supplements and enteral formula feedings.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: This modifier is used to convey order-specific modifiers about the type of food that should be given. These can be derived from patient allergies, intolerances, or preferences such as Halal, Vegan or Kosher. This modifier applies to the entire nutrition o

name: $excludeFoodModifier
desc: Returns: This modifier is used to convey order-specific modifiers about the type of food that should NOT be given. These can be derived from patient allergies, intolerances, or preferences such as No Red Meat, No Soy or No Wheat or  Gluten-Free.  While it should not be necessary to repeat allergy or intolerance information captured in the referenced AllergyIntolerance resource in the excludeFoodModifier, this element may be used to convey additional specificity related to foods that should be eliminated from the patient’s diet for any reason.  This modifier applies to the entire nutrition order inclusive of the oral diet, nutritional supplements and enteral formula feedings.

name: $addexcludeFoodModifier
desc: This modifier is used to convey order-specific modifiers about the type of food that should NOT be given. These can be derived from patient allergies, intolerances, or preferences such as No Red Meat, No Soy or No Wheat or  Gluten-Free.  While it should not be necessary to repeat allergy or intolerance information captured in the referenced AllergyIntolerance resource in the excludeFoodModifier, this element may be used to convey additional specificity related to foods that should be eliminated from the patient’s diet for any reason.  This modifier applies to the entire nutrition order inclusive of the oral diet, nutritional supplements and enteral formula feedings.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: This modifier is used to convey order-specific modifiers about the type of food that should NOT be given. These can be derived from patient allergies, intolerances, or preferences such as No Red Meat, No Soy or No Wheat or  Gluten-Free.  While it should n

name: $oralDiet
desc: Returns: Diet given orally in contrast to enteral (tube) feeding.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Diet given orally in contrast to enteral (tube) feeding.

name: $supplement
desc: Returns: Oral nutritional products given in order to add further nutritional value to the patient's diet.

name: $addsupplement
desc: Oral nutritional products given in order to add further nutritional value to the patient's diet.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Oral nutritional products given in order to add further nutritional value to the patient's diet.

name: $enteralFormula
desc: Returns: Feeding provided through the gastrointestinal tract via a tube, catheter, or stoma that delivers nutrition distal to the oral cavity.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Feeding provided through the gastrointestinal tract via a tube, catheter, or stoma that delivers nutrition distal to the oral cavity.
